channel.title: Vivien's Watchtower Notes
channel.description: Recent content on Vivien's Watchtower Notes

item.title: Woo
item.description: <2024-06-02 Sun>First Session Let’s Fucking Go! Receptacle Adel Boiss - Persian Spy W: +3 A: +4 T: +2 C:+2 H:+0 Ability - Persian Connections: The Persians, an opposing military force, trust Boiss’s decrees… Case Temporal anomaly - symptoms of sickness, etc. NPC: Selene Assistant to Madame E, Watcher We’ve worked together, casually. Notes A thief escaped and disappeared into the timestream, stole a list of some sensitive info Time Exits: One, presumably a thief Exit to ancient greece around 500BC, caused a ripple leading to a break in 480.
